## Skill Name

What would you call this skill? (kebab-case, e.g., `data-analysis`)

## Domain

What domain does this skill cover? (e.g., recruiting, accounting, coaching, data science)

## Who Benefits

Who would use this skill and why?

## Key Capabilities

What should this skill help users do? List 3-5 key capabilities.

1. ...
2. ...
3. ...

## Existing Expertise

Do you have experience in this domain? Are you willing to contribute the skill yourself?

## References

Any frameworks, books, or resources this skill should draw from?
